text1: ARTauto tow truck will deliver your vehicle to any place of your choice, at any time of the day. We will help in an unexpected situation and evacuate your vehicle after a traffic accident, pull it out of the ditch, etc. ARTauto will help you quickly and efficiently, regardless of the weather. Tel:
list4: Vehicles up to 4.8m long and 2m wide
text2: In the territory of Rezekne up to 100 kilometers the price is 25 EUR, exceeding 100 kilometers for each subsequent kilometer costs 0.50 EUR. Outside the city the cost is 0.50-0.70 EUR per kilometer.
